Paragraph: Clinical applications of calcium channel blockers parallel their tissue selectivity .

| calcium channel blockers |

In the given paragraph, the only chemical entity mentioned is "calcium channel blockers". These are a class of drugs that are used to treat a variety of conditions, such as high blood pressure, angina, and certain types of arrhythmias. They work by blocking calcium channels in the heart and blood vessels, which helps to relax the muscles and decrease the workload on the heart.
